featured.text: But after strike four, Sullivan became 23 death and took precautions during lightning strikes.
Even when tests came back negative, more were ordered, and she was hospitalized as a precaution when she developed a cold.
The organization encourages consumers to choose brands that take precautions to protect elephants and has set up a certification program to reward tea growers who are doing it right.

definition.zh_def: 預防措施；為了避免危險或問題而採取的行動。
definition.en_def: A measure taken in advance to prevent something dangerous or unpleasant from happening.
definition.example: Wearing a helmet is a precaution when riding a bicycle.
